name: Berry Cheesecake
description: Here we have a Berry cheesecake ! CAP New York Cheesecake and TFA Cheesecake Graham Crust make up the cheesecake flavor. CAP Sweet Cream Helps add a little creaminess to the cheesecake and helps make the berries stick to that cheesecake ! FLV Berry Blend and FLV Boysenberry help create the perfect Berries for the cheesecake ! CAP Super sweet just helps add a little sweetness and helps boost those berries ! Go mix it up leave your feedback !!!! Thanks SK !!!!!
author: SamKayla
